summary: Example script that configures and runs a hybrid speech‑to‑text model using NVIDIA NeMo's EncDecCTCModel with Hydra and PyTorch Lightning, illustrating how to set up, train, and evaluate the model.
business_intent: Provide a reproducible example for developers and researchers to prototype and benchmark a hybrid automatic speech recognition (ASR) pipeline, facilitating rapid experimentation and integration into speech‑enabled products.
